author: Simon Difford
description: Described by its creator as "the most delicious way to boost your immunity. The alcohol kills the germs. The local honey and lemon boost your immunity."
name: Gin Quarantini
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
